text: I thought I would hear something about this month’s changes with the full enforcement of the Kerberos protocol settings. I have checked a few domain controllers and it appears that the registry keys did not change (ie, remove the auditing value). I was expecting to see a value of 3 (full enforcement). Has anyone encountered any issues, concerns, we are particularly concerned with our legacy XP systems (I know, long story) ?? -- %40mail.gmail.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] October updates and Kerberos
